mapper.select: select member_id, member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_age, member_email, member_job, member_nickname, member_profile_system_name, member_profile_original_name, member_profile_file_path, resume_existence from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id, question_id, question_title, question_content, question_regdate, question_upddate from tbl_question where member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id, answer_id, answer_title, answer_content, answer_regdate, answer_upddate, question_id from tbl_answer where member_id = #{memberId}

select al.member_id member_id, a.member_id writer, a.answer_id, answer_title, answer_content, answer_regdate, answer_upddate, question_id from tbl_answer a left join tbl_answer_like al on a.answer_id = al.answer_id where al.member_id = #{memberId}

select ql.member_id member_id, q.member_id writer, q.question_id, question_title, question_content, question_regdate, question_upddate from tbl_question q left join tbl_question_like ql on q.question_id = ql.question_id where ql.member_id = #{memberId}
select count(like_id) like_count_question from tbl_question_like group by member_id having member_id = #{member_id}
select count(answer_like_id) like_count_answer from tbl_answer_like group by member_id having member_id = #{member_id}
select comment_id, comment_content, comment_depth, comment_regdate, comment_upddate, comment_group, member_id, question_id from tbl_question_comment where member_id = #{member_id}
select comment_id, comment_content, comment_depth, comment_regdate, comment_upddate, comment_group, member_id, question_id from tbl_question_comment where member_id = #{member_id}
select count(like_id) my_question_liked from tbl_question q left join tbl_question_like ql on q.question_id = ql.question_id group by q.question_id having member_id = #{member_id}
select count(answer_like_id) answer_liked from tbl_answer a left join tbl_answer_like al on a.answer_id = al.answer_id group by answer_id having member_id = #{member_id}
